com.yantra.api.ycd

Interface recordCustomerPick

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    com.yantra.api.YCDApi, YIFApi

    public interface recordCustomerPick

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.w3c.dom.Document recordCustomerPick(YFSEnvironment env, org.w3c.dom.Document inXML)
      The recordCustomerPick API records the Customer Pick of a Shipment.

    • Method Detail

      • recordCustomerPick

        org.w3c.dom.Document recordCustomerPick(YFSEnvironment env,
                                        org.w3c.dom.Document inXML)
                                 throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
                                        java.rmi.RemoteException,
                                        com.yantra.yfs.japi.YFSException

        The recordCustomerPick API records the Customer Pick of a Shipment.

        • If PickQty is not specified, the picked quantity will be equal to shipment line quantity
        • If PickQty is zero for shipment lines, the shipment line will get cancelled.
        • If 'Cancel' is chosen as shortage resolution, shortage quantity is cancelled from both shipment and order.
        • If the customer prefers to pick the shortage items later, then the remaining quantity is split using splitShipment API.
        • If some items are not picked due to inventory shortage, the shortage quantity of the items is backordered from the shipment.
        • If ShortageQuantity is not specified, the shortage will be calculated based on the shipment line quantity and picked quantity.
        • ShortageReason accepts all common codes with code type - 'YCD_SHORT_RESOLU' apart from AllInventoryShortage, PickLater or Cancel.If custom reason codes are passed in the shipment line then no specific action is taken on the line.UE can be implemented to perform custom logic in these cases


        Related Yantra Documents
        Input XML Input DTD Output XML Output DTD Error XML Error DTD

        User Exits:


          com.yantra.pca.ycd.japi.ue.YCDUpdateLocationInventoryUE
            This user exit is called to update the inventory. The error code YCD00030 is thrown if an exception occurs during the invocation of this user exit.

          com.yantra.pca.ycd.japi.ue.YCDBeforeConfirmShipmentOfRecordCustomerPickUE
            This user exit is called to implement any custom logic based user configured shortage resolution code. The error code YCD00030 is thrown if an exception occurs during the invocation of this user exit.

          com.yantra.pca.ycd.japi.ue.YCDAfterConfirmShipmentOfRecordCustomerPickUE
            This user exit is called to implement any custom logic based user configured shortage resolution code. The error code YCD00030 is thrown if an exception occurs during the invocation of this user exit.

          Events Raised:

            ON_SUCCESS:
              This event is raised upon successful execution of the API.
              Data Published YDM_CHANGE_SHIPMENT.ON_SUCCESS.html, YDM_CHANGE_SHIPMENT_STATUS.ON_SUCCESS_dtd.txt
              Key data - shipment_dbd.txt

            Internally this calls changeShipment and changeShipmentStatus APIs. Refer to the events generated by these APIs.

            Template Support: None

            Audits: None

            Pre Conditions: None

            Post Conditions: None

            Output Template Support: Yes

            Database Extensibility Support: No

            Configuration Required for Backward Compatibility: No

        Parameters:
        env - Required. Environment handle returned by the createEnvironment API.
        inXML - Required. For more information, see the associated input xml files.

        Returns:
        A XML document that contains the confirmed status of the shipment refer to the associated output files.

        Throws:
        com.yantra.yfs.japi.YFSException - Yantra exception containing error codes in the standard error files.
        java.rmi.RemoteException - Java's default remote exception handler.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
